name: 崔紘嘉
objective:
本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解訊號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為通訊、控制、電子電路、濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1) 標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2) 連續系統的數學分析 (3) 離散系統的數學分析 (4) 拉氏轉換分析 (5) Z - 轉換分析 (6) 傅立葉分析 (7) 工程應用。
This course contains the properties of signals, systems, LTI systems, and basis linear transforms. This is a basic course in the field of communication and control.
The course introduces the properties of signals and systems, and is a fundamental course for those who are interested in communications, signal processing, control systems, and electronic circuits. The student will learn about the basic concepts of continuous-time and discrete-time signal processing. The covered topics are:

1. Signals and systems
2. Linear time-invariant systems
3. Fourier series representation of periodic signals
4. The continuous-time Fourier transform
5. The discrete-time Fourier transform
6. Sampling
7. Time and frequency characterization of signals and systems 
8. The Z-transform (optional)
9. The Laplace-transform (optional)
schedule:
Week 1~3  Continuous-time and discrete-time signals
Week 4~7  Linear time-invariant systems
Week 8-12 Fourier analysis for continuous-time signals(including midterm exam) 
Week 13-15 Unmanned vehicle communication and cooperation technology
Week 16-17 The Z-transform
Week 18  Final Exam
The schedule may be adjusted if necessary.
materials:
Textbook: A. V. Oppenheim, A. S. Willsky, and S. Hamid, Signals and Systems, 2nd Edition, Prentice Hall.
Reference: A. K. Bolstad and J. A. Dickerson, Open Signals and Systems Laboratory Exercises, Iowa State University Digital Press. (Can be obtained from https://open.umn.edu/opentextbooks/textbooks/open-signals-and-systems-laboratory-exercises)
consultation: 授課內容講義或注意事項均公布於北科 i 學園 PLUS。若上課有疑問可透過 E-mail 或班群組討論相關事項。
